title: 5-GHz chip-based quantum key distribution with 1Mbps secure key rate over 150 km
summary: Quantum key distribution (QKD) enables secure communication by harnessing the fundamental principles of quantum physics, which inherently guarantee information-theoretic security and intrinsic resistance to quantum computing attacks.
